name: ensemble
description: For the final project, our group has decided to create a mock social media app that can allow users to search, create, join bands with their preferences of genre and instruments. This project was built using React front-end, with PostgreSQL db and Express.js back-end.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-frontend && npm run install-backend && npm run server-initialize && cd client && npm start

author: Drew Kang
